sentences.sContent: Our ship is on to the wharf.
The boatmen boomed the boat off the wharf.
sentences.sCn: 船夫用竿把船推离码头。

sentences.sContent: The ship lies alongside the wharf.; The steamer lies at the pier.

synos.tran: 使靠码头；为…建码头；把货卸在码头上

phrases.pCn: n. 渔人码头（美国旧金山旅游观光名胜）
码头岸肩；自码头货棚至水边间的空间

trans.tranOther: a structure that is built out into the water so that boats can stop next to it
